fields.value: Height of Registered Voters in Pittsburgh and Allegheny County, Pennsylvania, c. 1870-1950

dsDescriptionValue.value: This data collection was designed to ascertain the physical   stature of Pittsburgh residents in the first half of the twentieth   century. These data supply information on voters' age, year of birth,  height, gender, and race, as well as their party affiliation.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR XVII.G. Social Institutions and Behavior, Vital Statistics

fields.value: Version Date: 2003-05-23Version Text: 2003-05-23 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL with SAS and SPSS data defintion statements and SPSS portable file;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: (1) The data contain alphabetics. The PDF file  format was developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated and can be accessed  using PDF reader software, such as the Adobe Acrobat Reader. Information  on how to obtain a copy of the Acrobat Reader is provided on the ICPSR Web site.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: SPSS portable file(s), Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;
